text: Gérard Cherpion (2016) Gérard Cherpion (born 15 March 1948 in Dombasle-sur- Meurthe, Meurthe-et-Moselle) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Vosges department, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Meurthe-et-Moselle Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Social Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Regional councillors of Grand Est
title: Gérard Cherpion
